attributes.action: ignore all of these petitions (except this one).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This whole thing is clearly a Daily Mail inspired plot. Look at the top five petitions - No to tax on destroying the planet, no to tax on inherited wealth, hoorah for killing foxes and fighter jets, I wonder if I'm related to Henry VIII? Good grief.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
